<title level="1" pfs="">[Kargstaad's Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2347)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 39

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Kargstaad's Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2347)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=79" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 434</row>

**Perception** +27; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_[+2 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) white [dragonhide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=274) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _[+2 striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)_, [sack with 5 rocks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 37 

**Fort** +29 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +25 

</row>

**HP** 270
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 15)

**Immunities**
cold

**Weaknesses**
fire 15

**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet; ice stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greataxe_ +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d12+22 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+22 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +29 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d10+13 bludgeoning

**Chill Breath** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The frost giant breathes out a 15-foot cone of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing 7d6 cold damage. Each creature in the cone must attempt a DC 36 basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save is also immobilized and takes 2d6 cold damage at the end of each of its turns until it gets free (Escape DC 36). The giant can't use Chill Breath again for 1d4 rounds.

**Ice Stride**   A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor does it need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice.

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Wide Swing** <actions string="Single Action" />  The frost giant makes a single greataxe Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the frost giant's multiple attack penalty.

</column>
name: Kargstaad's Giant

</summary>
text: Kargstaad's Giant Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 39 Unspecific Lore : DC 37 Specific Lore : DC 34 Kargstaad's Giant Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 434 Perception +27; low-light vision Languages Common, Jotun Skills Athletics +31, Crafting +25, Intimidation +27, Stealth +25 Str +8 Dex +4 Con +6 Int +0 Wis +4 Cha +4 Items +2 resilient white dragonhide breastplate , +2 striking greataxe , sack with 5 rocks --- AC 37 Fort +29 Ref +25 Will +25 HP 270 (fast healing 15) Immunities cold Weaknesses fire 15 Catch Rock Reaction --- Speed 30 feet; ice stride Melee Single Action greataxe +29 (Magical, reach 10 feet, Sweep), Damage 2d12+22 slashing Melee Single Action fist +29 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+22 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action rock +29 (Brutal, range increment 120 feet), Damage 3d10+13 bludgeoning Chill Breath Single Action (Cold, Evocation, Primal) The frost giant breathes out a 15-foot cone of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing 7d6 cold damage. Each creature in the cone must attempt a DC 36 basic Reflex save. A creature that fails its save is also immobilized and takes 2d6 cold damage at the end of each of its turns until it gets free (Escape DC 36). The giant can't use Chill Breath again for 1d4 rounds. Ice Stride A frost giant isn't impeded by difficult terrain caused by snow or ice, nor does it need to attempt Acrobatics checks to keep from falling on slippery ice. Throw Rock Single Action Wide Swing Single Action The frost giant makes a single greataxe Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the frost giant's multiple attack penalty.
